TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdRotator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供伺服器控制項，以在行動裝置網頁上顯示隨機選取的廣告。

span.span: Provides a server control to display a randomly selected advertisement on a mobile page.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會使用相同的組態檔做為 Web Form類別。The class uses the same configuration file as the Web Forms class. 行動控制項不僅會公開的相同的屬性和事件中的當做許多控制項，再加上它加入行動裝置的功能。The mobile control exposes many of the same properties and events as the control, plus it adds mobile capability. 重新整理頁面時，就會變更顯示的廣告。The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page is refreshed. 屬性指定的 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的位置。The property specifies the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information. 這個檔案必須位於應用程式定義域中。This file must reside within the application domain. 基於安全性考量，XML 檔案應該在 App_Data 資料夾中，設定為不允許使用者直接存取 XML 檔案。For security purposes, XML files should be in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files. 如果屬性是空的控制項產生單一中斷標記做為預留位置。If the property is empty, the control generates a single break tag as a placeholder. 當您不想要顯示的廣告時，這非常有用。This is useful when you do not want to display an advertisement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是由兩個部分所組成： ASP.NET mobile Web Form 頁面`.aspx`檔案和 XML 檔案。The following code example consists of two parts: an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page in an `.aspx` file and an XML file. `.aspx`檔會使用名為`ads.xml`循環根據各種通告屬性。The `.aspx` file uses a file named `ads.xml` to rotate through various advertisements based on the property. 如果您提供的映像的範例，則會顯示。否則，控制項顯示的值與通告的屬性。If you provide the images for the example, they will be displayed; otherwise, the control displays the value of the property for the advertisements. 當使用者重新整理行動 Web Forms 網頁時，此頁面會顯示下一個隨機選取的公告，根據。When the user refreshes the mobile Web Forms page, the page displays the next randomly selected advertisement, based on the . 此範例也示範如何使用[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)覆寫的屬性，如果使用者的瀏覽器需要 WML 標記，以及如何將對應的映像的項目`src`和`href`屬性在 XML 中的資料檔案使用和屬性，分別。The example also shows how to use a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element to override the properties if the user's browser requires WML markup, and how to map the image's `src` and `href` attributes to the data in the XML file using the and properties, respectively. 雖然此範例使用函式判斷瀏覽器是否需要 WML (`isWML11`)，您可以改用 Web.config 檔案來定義來作決定為您的.NET Framework 會自動使用的項目：Although the example uses a function to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you: > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). `.aspx`檔案：The `.aspx` file: [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#1)] 此範例`ads.xml`檔案 (其中必須位於**App_Data**資料夾):The sample `ads.xml` file (which must be located in the **App_Data** folder): [!code-xml[MobileAdRotatorSample#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/Common/ads.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定，就會發生此事件之後已從檔案選取廣告。If the property is set, this event occurs after the advertisement has been selected from the file. 事件處理常式會接收屬性，其中包含顯示廣告的屬性。The event handler receives an property that contains the properties of the advertisement being displayed. 下表顯示這個事件特有的屬性，提供的資訊。The following table shows the properties that provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||傳回字典，其中包含擷取自 XML 檔案之後的所有通告屬性就會引發事件。Returns the dictionary that contains all the advertisement properties extracted from an XML file after the event is raised.| ||指定的替代文字和工具提示 （如果瀏覽器支援） 來呈現在控制項。Specifies the alternate text and ToolTip (if supported by the browser) to be rendered in the control.| ||指定要在呈現的影像控制項。Specifies the image to be rendered in the control.| ||指定當按一下廣告時瀏覽器瀏覽的 URL 參考。Specifies the URL reference that the browser navigates to when the advertisement is clicked.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例的控制代碼事件，並只是一個較大範例的一部分類別概觀。The following code sample handles the event, and is only part of a larger example for the class overview. [!code-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#3)]

para.span: 出於安全性目的，XML 檔應該在 [App_Data] 資料夾中，該資料夾已設定為不允許使用者直接存取 XML 檔。

span.span: For security purposes, XML files should be placed in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files.

span.span: The element name from which the image URL is retrieved for an advertisement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在各種用途的來源 XML 檔案中建立項目。You can create elements in the source XML file for a variety of purposes. 例如，您可以針對行動網頁和 Web 網頁中使用相同的 XML 檔案，但想要針對每個不同的影像檔。For example, you may want to use the same XML file for both mobile pages and Web pages, but want a different image file for each one. 使用屬性來指定 XML 檔案中的哪個項目您想要使用的影像 URL。Use the property to specify which element in your XML file you want to use for the image URL. 您也可以使用個別[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)覆寫此設定，顯示廣告的替代影像項目。You can also use separate [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate images for the advertisement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以選取特定的項目從 XML 檔案中的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to select a specific item from a record in the XML file. 此.aspx 檔案會指定影像 URL 的值，可從取得``元素的 XML 檔案，並使用[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目，如果使用者的瀏覽器需要 WML 選取不同的影像 URL標記。This .aspx file specifies that the value for the image URL can be obtained from the `` element of the XML file, and uses a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element to select a different image URL if the user's browser requires WML markup. `.aspx`檔案：The `.aspx` file: [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#1)] 此範例`ads.xml`檔案 (其中必須位於**App_Data**資料夾):The sample `ads.xml` file (which must be located in the **App_Data** folder): [!code-xml[MobileAdRotatorSample#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/Common/ads.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeywordFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於從廣告檔案篩選廣告的分類關鍵字。

span.span: Gets or sets a category keyword that you can use to filter advertisements from an advertisement file.

summary.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

value.span: 用於識別特定類別內廣告的關鍵字。

span.span: The keyword used to identify advertisements within a specific category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性有資料，而這屬性具有內容，控制項選取相符的關鍵字與公告。If the property has data and this property has content, the control selects an advertisement with a matching keyword. 如果屬性有資料，而這屬性具有內容但沒有這個屬性與檔案之間關鍵字相符，會顯示空白的映像並追蹤警告產生。If the property has data and this property has content but there is no keyword match between this property and the file, a blank image displays and a trace warning is generated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性集合中的映像的喜好設定設定檔中所參考屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the preference from a collection of images in the file referred by the property. 完整範例程式碼，請參閱類別概觀。For the complete sample code, see the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)覆寫此設定可顯示廣告的替代 Url 的項目。You can use [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate URLs for the advertisement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定通知的目標 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the target URL for the advertisement. 完整範例程式碼，請參閱類別概觀。For the complete sample code, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承的類別可以覆寫此方法以執行其他工作。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 比方說，您可以使用其他準則來篩選廣告會根據控制項，或您可以記錄計費的公告。For example, you can use other criteria to filter how an advertisement is chosen by the control, or you can record the advertisement for billing purposes.
